governor_profile.angelic_role: Archangel of Lightning Revelation; marshals celestial legions.
governor_profile.essence: When NOTIABI is invoked, truth arrives like a lightning strike sharp, sudden, and unerring, cutting through falsehood in an instant.

form.name: crystalline
form.description: A multi-dimensional geometric construct combining lightning-like fractal structures with translucent prism-like edges, representing the lightning revelation of truth through Air element's intellectual clarity

color.reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's mental clarity and lightning's revelatory power; silver-white symbolizes divine truth and celestial transmission from Enochian angelic traditions

geometry.reasoning: Merkaba geometry represents divine light vehicle; tetrahedron symbolizes pure mental construct; fractal patterns demonstrate infinite complexity of truth

environment.reasoning: Creates localized field of perceptual clarity, electrically charging surrounding space to induce heightened awareness

time_variations.reasoning: Non-linear temporal manifestation reflecting truth's dynamic nature

energy_signature.reasoning: Spiraling energy represents divine information download, transcending linear perception

symbol_set.reasoning: Triangular sigil represents revelation; Vesica Piscis symbolizes generative divine intersection

light_shadow.reasoning: Truth emerges through luminous revelation, with transformative potential in shadow integration

special_properties.reasoning: Embodies lightning-like revelation, breaking through perceptual illusions instantly

governor_profile.name: NOTIABI
governor_profile.title: 'Servant who speaks the truth'
